mysteryDungeon:NegativeStance.NAME: Negative Stance
DESCRIPTION: The first two skill played each turn will grant you one focus each. NL When you exit this stance, evoke your next two Orbs.

mysteryDungeon:PositiveStance.NAME: Positive Stance
DESCRIPTION: When you play an attack, channel 1 lightning orb if you have any empty slot. NL When you exit this stance, gain 7 block.
